content.subject: Applications for Admission to M.Sc. Programmes against vacant seats after CCMN-2024 for academic session 2024-25

programmes.name: M.Sc. in Chemistry
programmes.special_eligibility: Chemistry as a subject in all the years/semesters in B.Sc., minimum 3 years duration

eligibility: B.Sc. in Mathematics and Computer Application

programmes.special_eligibility: Mathematics as a subject in all the years/semesters in B.Sc., minimum 3 years duration

programmes.name: M.Sc. in Physics
programmes.special_eligibility: Physics as a subject in all the years/semesters in B.Sc., minimum 3 years duration

general_eligibility.GEN/GEN-EWS/OBC: 60% marks or 6.5 CGPA on 10-point scale in B.Sc. subject
general_eligibility.SC/ST/PwD: 55% marks or 6.0 CGPA on 10-point scale in B.Sc. subject

other_requirements: Separate application required for multiple departments with requisite fee
CGPA-to-percentage conversion by institute/university not considered
Provisional admission allowed if final result awaited, must submit all documents by 30/09/2024
Undertaking in prescribed format must be uploaded

instructions_for_applicants.applications: Multiple programs allowed with separate registration and fee
instructions_for_applicants.credentials: Application ID and password sent to registered email

general_terms_conditions: Institute may cancel candidature without reason
Minimum qualifications do not guarantee test/interview
Original documents must be produced during verification
Technical issues email: help.pgadmnnita@gmail.com or nitmisagt@gmail.com
Regularly check Institute website for updates
